class.rdfs:comment:
An action performed by a direct agent and indirect participants upon a direct object. Optionally happens at a location with the help of an inanimate instrument. The execution of the action may produce a result. Specific action sub-type documentation specifies the exact expectation of each argument/role.

See also blog post and Actions overview document.
class.rdfs:label: Action

schema:actionStatus.rdfs:comment: Indicates the current disposition of the Action.
schema:actionStatus.rdfs:label: actionStatus

schema:agent.rdfs:comment: The direct performer or driver of the action (animate or inanimate). e.g. John wrote a book.
schema:agent.rdfs:label: agent

schema:endTime.rdfs:comment:
The endTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to end. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December. For media, including audio and video, it's the time offset of the end of a clip within a larger file.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.
schema:endTime.rdfs:label: endTime

schema:error.rdfs:comment: For failed actions, more information on the cause of the failure.
schema:error.rdfs:label: error

schema:instrument.rdfs:comment: The object that helped the agent perform the action. e.g. John wrote a book with a pen.
schema:instrument.rdfs:label: instrument

schema:location.rdfs:comment: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.
schema:location.rdfs:label: location

schema:object.rdfs:comment: The object upon which the action is carried out, whose state is kept intact or changed. Also known as the semantic roles patient, affected or undergoer (which change their state) or theme (which doesn't). e.g. John read a book.
schema:object.rdfs:label: object

schema:participant.rdfs:comment: Other co-agents that participated in the action indirectly. e.g. John wrote a book with Steve.
schema:participant.rdfs:label: participant

schema:result.rdfs:comment: The result produced in the action. e.g. John wrote a book.
schema:result.rdfs:label: result

schema:startTime.rdfs:comment:
The startTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to start. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December. For media, including audio and video, it's the time offset of the start of a clip within a larger file.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.
schema:startTime.rdfs:label: startTime

schema:target.rdfs:comment: Indicates a target EntryPoint for an Action.
schema:target.rdfs:label: target
